dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: black

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: As fun as singing was, the Literature Club had soon gone back to their regular club activity of writing and poems when Boyfriend and Girlfriend departed.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Though every so often, the two would make their visit, and the pleasant bouts of song would return to the clubroom.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Today, however, was quite the unusual lineup of club attendees.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: The two boys were absent, leaving today's meeting consisting of the original four girls...

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: lovenfunkin

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: and Girlfriend!

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "This is the first time I've ever seen you apart from your boyfriend."

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *blank expression*

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I was told that Boyfriend is acting as a vocal coach for a certain someone now. They must be occupied with that."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "D-don't tell him I told you that though-!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Looks like it's just us today then!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Come to think of it, I honestly can't remember the last time we've had an all girls meeting."

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Oooh, yeah! Actually, I've been wondering about this for a while, but hey Girlfriend!"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *surprised look*

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "I don't think I've seen you participate in any of our club activities before. We'd love to have you get more involved!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "You've been the quiet type, I've noticed. But I'm sure deep down there's so much you wanna say."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "And this is the perfect place to write the way into your heart! Have you ever written a poem before?"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *confused gaze*

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "If you haven't, we can teach you! We're basically poetry experts by now."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I wouldn't mind helping you to find your writing style. Writing your feelings down can help you express deep down what you may have trouble expressing vocally."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "You've heard your boyfriend rap so much. Some of his rhymes had to have rubbed off on you."

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Heck, I'm surprised I haven't heard you sing either considering how music centric he is."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "That gives me another idea. Why not write a love song for Boyfriend? That way we can help you with writing and singing too!"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Yeah, yeah! And what better way to help you write a song than to teach you with a song! Does that sound good?"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *cheering*

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Okay, everyone! It's time for a lesson I'll call..."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Love n' Funkin'!"
